values: Yes, Yes I know I am bad at updating my journal but I really don't have anything to say. Such a dull existence. However a girl who was my best friend years and years ago and whom i spoke to once two years ago called me the other night its strange having to catch someone up on a part of my life they missed. anyway, thats not why i am writing in this journal. it is because I am so excited about going to Spain this summer. Last week I wasn't really planning on going, but now i want to so bad. i am so excited. i will be there from like july 1 until the 31. I will be going there with some other students from USD but we have to sign a contract saying that we won't speak english while we are over there. ahh, so intimidating! anyway i think there are like 15 other students from USD and then it is going to be open to students of other countries which means the only we will be able to talk to them is through spanish because they won't speak english they will speak like german, french, or russian. anyway that is enough for now.
http://mairmair.livejournal.com/14205.html

I just bought a blizzard but i am really uninterested in eating it. So I don't really update my journal too often and i don't really know why. i guess whenever i have something to say i just tell emily and amber. and yes, you read that right it says amber. i have been talking to her since her birthday. i really do miss her and i don't hate her or blame her for anything. one cannot control the way their heart feels and i know that now, i am just too stubborn to get over things. but anyway she comes home the 16th and we might go and get our hair done, but then i am also going to get my hair done with emily too. 

hmm well this semester is finally over. thank god that i made it through the semester. it's hard going to work and going to school so i respect everyone that does that. i am not going to miss any of my class however my spanish 211 class did get really fun towards the end. oh well, i am taking the second half next semester so it will be fun too. i got an email today regarding my study abroad in spain and they want to switch it to leaving in july rather than june and i am not so sure i am down with that. it means i will miss my birthday and then i will be gone for the very middle of my summer break. i also saw the names of the other people who were going and this one kid who i think is a pompous ass is going. he frustrates me. if i go i have to sign a honor contract saying i won't speak any english while i am in Vigo. crazy, i know.

well, thats enough for now, i must go read because i have to work at 7:45 tomorrow morning.

oh funny story/embarassing story...
  i went to the store with my sister and uncle's girlfriend. i was riding in the back seat with the window down, when the cherry off of my sister's cigarette that she tossed out the window hit the seat right by my head. i looked around to see if the cigarette was still in the car, but didn't see it. then we went inside and we were paying for it, when karen(uncle's girlfriend) says "Mary, you're smoking!". I didn't know what she was talking about so i took off my hoodie. the cigarette landed in my hood!!! and my hair was in the hood so i was so lucky my hair didn't catch fire. i have to throw my jacket out because it is all burnt now, but i still have my hair.

i got back from NC yesterday. I had a blast. All week I shopped, a lot. we always went to the movies, went out to eat and bought a bunch of dvds to watch. saturday night we were watching a movie when bolten called because he and two of his friends were drunk so amanda and i and this guy steve had to go pick them up because we needed to drive their cars back to the base. i wasn't upset about it like amanda was. the only thing that worried me was that i had to drive a guy back that has grabbed my boob before so i was worried about his grabby hands. instead he just asked a lot of weird questions. so when we got back to the barracks we were all standing around wating for amanda to get back. i ended up going into steve's room and spending the rest of the night there. i left at 6:30 the next morning even though he said i could have stayed the night there but amanda might have been suspicous. we had such a great time. we drank wine which is disgusting and i will never drink again. and we watched a couple of movies. the first one we watched we just laughed the entire time and had no idea what was going on in it. man it was just so great. i ended up having a crush on him despite he is shorter than me. then the next night i hung out with matt for like an hour which was really great too, he was unusually funny. that was great to and he told me i looked good. but that was obviously sleep deprivation getting to him. so i said goodbye to him that night and i may never see him again which is sad, but its ok.  then i went to steve's room and hung out with his roommate since he wasn't there when finally i gave up waiting i ended up meeting him outside we talked for a bit and he invited me in but i declined so he gave me a hug which was nice. anyway then the next day i left and damn near missed my flight. so here i am today once again stressing out about my grades. but on the upside this is like my last week of school hopefully forever at ASU.

so earlier today i thought i was having a pretty good day. i did my homework last night and was pleased with the outcomes. i went to class and my spanish brochure was awesome even though i found out it wasn't do today. then i came home and my sister had called me. i tried calling her back but i didn't get a hold of her so then i attempted to get the phone bill and electricity put into ambers name. then amber comes home to give me money and we started talking. i told her everything she has to do in order for me to get my name off the lease so it all seems well. then i exchanged a few stories with her. then we talked about the history test and thats when it happened. the most unbelievably stupid thing i could possibly do. not to mention the pain. i sat there laughing so hard i was crying and part of the tears were for pain. i sat there enduring it for a few minutes out of confusion on what to actually do and amber just kept laughing and trying to help me and everytime i asked what to do and attempted to fix the problem she would say what to do then plug her ears and turn around out of fear that i mean scream in pain she was even preparing to suggest going to the emergency room. so i assume you are wondering what happened? well haha this is embarrassing, while we were talking i was playing with my stapler and just like popping staples out and then i put my thumb over the holes and pressed down. now what happened was the staple went all the way into my thumb. not just a little bit. the prongs or what have you were all the way in my thumb. i don't remember how it happened i just remember looking at my thumb and seeing the staple and the showing amber. out biggest concern was whether or not the staple was pinched off or not in which case i would have gone to the emergency room. so i sat there trying to pull it out which wasn't easy at all. i would pull a little and stop, i about passed out. i could feel the metal moving inside my thumb. it was terrible and this is coming from a person who has piercing and has seen needles sticking out through parts of their body, but this hurt. by the time i got it pulled out my thumb was practically numb. my thumb still hurts now and it has two holes, basically i just pierced my thumb really. yeah not cool, anyway the end.

so i was checking my application status online for ku and they had updated it to conditional admit, so i'm thinking hmmm what is this, so i click the link. it then proceeds to inform me that i must keep a C or above cumulative gpa in order to get in. now is about the time i completely freaked out. i even cried because i really really wanted to get in and i thought i had fucked myself over because i am failing two classes right now. so then i call ku and was like well if you get my act scores and my high school transcript would that change my status and they told me no! they said it is all based on what i get this semester. i am like oh fuck so i call my brother, crying of course, and tell him about it. so he goes through my cumulative gpa right now and makes this equation where i can find out what my gpa will be, here i will copy and paste it: 2.72*29credits+0*(the number of credits you will fail)+(the grade you are expecting)*#of credits of the class +(the grade you are expecting)*#of credits of the class =..then divide by 43 which is the number of credits..this will determine the new cumulative gpa. how amazing is that my brother the genius. so anyway i can get a C and a D AND fail two classes and still maintain a C average or i can get a B in spanish and an F in history and still get into KU. amazing...

yeah so i have failed to write in my journal all this week but it has been pretty hectic.so much has been going on. i have a guy chasing after me whom i would love to kick in the balls to get him off my back and then there is this strange need to call matt but i have been holding off on that, also it seems a second friend of mine has been living a lie. for those of you who don't know my former best friend had been living one for seven months so i tend to not trust people as well and notice more inconsistencies in stories.  So friend B as i shall call her has had this great relationship going on with her "boyfriend" for several months now. I never had the opportunity to meet him but she would tell me of all their outings and what not. well it was about a week or two ago when things started to be off he would tell me one thing and then later say something that would throw the previous statement into an inaccurate one. sorry if this isn't fluid but i am tired. anyway as it turns out due to my amazing detective work and a conversation with her sister i have come to find out that everything that happened during their time together was actually not true. this entire time the guy was a guy she met and talked to online. their "outings" were actually, i don't know detailed fantasies, i suppose about them being in the same place which isn't possible because they were online. so everything she told me was a lie. i don't know what to do? i mean i don't know why she would lie like this i mean she is my friend she should be honest with me. i do have compassion for her so its like gah i don't know what to do. should i say something or should i go on letting her live her fantasy but gosh that can't be healthy. i wonder if she is doing it to cover up for something else like maybe she is a lesbian and not ready to come out so created a fictional boyfriend to cover up. gah i just dont' know what to do, so if you have any ideas feel free to comment?

i heard this song on the radio today and realized that the band wrote it about amber and matt. its a good song. its called "No Regrets" by Divit.


Please to please you and shake the hand
That waits for me to leave, to stab me in the back
Good to see you and make you laugh
With the same mouth that calls the kettle black
And I want to say so many things
But three little words are all I need
To burn the bridge with no regrets to keep

I'm sorry to say that I hate you
and I never want to see you again
it's not a mistake that I met you
and it taught me everything

Here's to you two and your success
Congratulations on the perfect mess
Oh what to do but the best
You'll never be good enough just like the rest

I'd like to say that it was fun living under the gun
I'd like to say I like you but that wouldn't be true

I just got off the phone with Emily and it kind of made me feel bad. It wasn't Emily, its because of Alex. He said something when she told him it was me and now I am being all paranoid. I feel bad for the way our friendship ended. He meant so much to me when I was friends with him. He was like a little brother. We had so many good times and it was great when he worked across the street from me and would visit me when he got off work. I loved spending time with him. I feel responsible for why it ended and I know its my fault. I apologized when I saw him before I left for Arizona last year. We went to the horizon and talked, but not for very long. I remember we were sitting there and I just started crying because i missed being friends with him so much. i hated being around him this summer because it was so uncomfortable and i feel like he hates me now. I know what i did in the past was wrong but i can't changed no matter how much i regret it. it seems like every best guy friend i have had since nick died, i lost them with it somehow being my fault. With Dusty in freshman and sophomore year. We were awesome friends and it was so awesome hanging out with him and talking about so much stuff. i loved the fact i knew more about him than his girlfriend. We always had a blast at the games and it was just great. Somewhere along the line distance grew between us. I could have tried harder to keep our friendship going but i think, i'm not sure, that somewhere along the line we got into a fight. Doesn't surprise me if that happened. But seeing him and hanging out with him this summer was awesome. It wasn't awkward at all except maybe when i was trying to get him to fool around with me in closets. What about with matt? we argued all the time. i know it wasn't just my fault because he wouldn't leave me alone, but i lost two friends because of him. Now, i am here in arizona with no friends at all and i spend all my time in my bedroom with nothing to do but look back at all my lost friendships. and i almost lost my friendship with emily, but i am thankful now that i didn't because she means a lot to me. I MISS YOU EM!

Yeah! I received a very nice care package in the mail today. Its contents were as follows: a t-shirt that kicks ass, a cd which i have listened to approximately 14 minutes of and its hilarious, and a plastic bag filled with cookies which i shall discuss further. The cookies were frosted with various colors and the only color which i can really tell what it is, is green. The cookies came in various shapes including: dinosaurs with their heads chopped and some with nipped tails, parts of stars, small pieces the size of quarters which i enjoy the most because they are "bite size," and many many crumbs. Do not take this wrong i love these cookies they are very good and delicious and i believe i have eaten too many today, but what boggles my mind is the dinosaurs with their heads chopped off. There is not one dinosaur with its head intact. This makes me wonder if this is a deliberate threat on my body parts or the specific wish of the displacement of my head. 

Working out has been displeasing the past two days. i have done twice as many reps for everything i normally do and i feel nothing anymore, where has that wonderful burning feeling gone? I feel like i'm doing stuff and its not having an affect on me. Its an extreme disappointment. So much so that i couldn't even sleep last night, i was tossing and turning because my efforts have seemed fruitless.
